EmailTemplate.name: 1 - Differentiation RE
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Differentiate yourself from the competition!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
I just left you a voicemail detailing how you can gain credibility with prospects and differentiate yourself from the competition using some of Five Star Professional's marketing tools.
I've helped some of the top-producing professionals in the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Market_City__c} area. I'd like to connect with you some time over the next couple of days to talk about how you can use some of those same strategies to grow your business.
2015 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession_c} Award Guide
Thoughts?
{!User.Name}
Account Manager Five Star Professional
2900 Lone Oak Parkway
Suite 120, Eagan, MN 55121
Direct: {!User.Phone}
{!User.Email}
www.fivestarprofessional.com
